description_expanded: Liquid I.V. Hydration Multiplier Popsicle Firecracker Drink Mix (6 Pack) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for health & wellness. Powdered electrolyte drink mix in a limited edition Popsicle Firecracker flavor. Designed for rapid hydration, it's perfect for hot days, travel, or recovery. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
